derivation: middle voice from G4253 (προκαλέομαι) and G2564 (προκαλέομαι);
strongs_def: to call forth to oneself (challenge), i.e. (by implication) to irritate
outline:
1. to call forth
  2. to call forth to one's self
    1. esp. to challenge to a combat or contest with one
  3. to provoke, to irritate
